title: i want to know how someone (google) has taken over my router, my phone, my tv. all my devices?
content: ive bought 2 new phones, new router, new internet provider, changed my email, my phone number.. you name it. my photos were locked as well as ally contacts. they locked my amazon account, my netflix, hulu, my phone. all of it.. i have screen shots to prove something is encrypted and embedded in my devices. my laptop, my tablet.. locked out of them. no facebook, or instagram, locked out... im so angry and humilated..
